definition[0]: to officially give someone a job or position of authority, especially at a special ceremony
example[0]: Eighteen new junior ministers were inducted into the government.
definition[1]: to officially introduce someone into an important place of honour at a special ceremony
example[1]: Barry was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame in 1987.
definition[2]: to officially introduce someone into a group or organization, especially the army
definition[3]: to officially introduce someone into a new job or organization, usually through a special ceremony
example[2]: Mr Clay will be inducted into the company as president at a benefit dinner on Sunday.
